name: ocaml
description:
OCaml is an industrial strength programming language supporting
functional, imperative and object-oriented styles

dependencies.name: ncurses
dependencies.description:
The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses
in System V Release 4.0, and more. It uses terminfo format, supports
pads and color and multiple highlights and forms characters and
function-key mapping, and has all the other SYSV-curses enhancements
over BSD curses.

dependent_to.name: unison
dependent_to.description:
Unison is a file-synchronization tool for OSX, Unix, and Windows. It
allows two replicas of a collection of files and directories to be
stored on different hosts (or different disks on the same host),
modified separately, and then brought up to date by propagating the
changes in each replica to the other.

dependent_to.name: whizard
dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.

dependent_to.name: ocamlbuild
dependent_to.description:
OCamlbuild is a generic build tool, that has built-in rules for building
OCaml library and programs.

dependent_to.name: opam
dependent_to.description:
OPAM: OCaml Package Manager OPAM is a source-based package manager for
OCaml. It supports multiple simultaneous compiler installations,
flexible package constraints, and a Git-friendly development workflow.

dependent_to.name: hevea
dependent_to.description: Hevea a fast Latex to HTML translator
